title: With Omicron Surging, London Declares a ‘Major Incident'
content:
1. With Omicron Surging, London Declares a ‘Major Incident'  The New York Times
  2. Omicron coronavirus cases surge in UK, scientists see bigger wave  Reuters UK
  3. England Has Hundreds of Thousands of New Omicron Cases Daily  Bloomberg
  4. Major incident declared in London amid ‘hugely concerning’ Omicron spread  The Independent
  5. COVID: London declares 'major incident' over Omicron spread  Al Jazeera English
contentSnippet:
With Omicron Surging, London Declares a ‘Major Incident'  The New York Times
Omicron coronavirus cases surge in UK, scientists see bigger wave  Reuters UK
England Has Hundreds of Thousands of New Omicron Cases Daily  Bloomberg
Major incident declared in London amid ‘hugely concerning’ Omicron spread  The Independent
COVID: London declares 'major incident' over Omicron spread  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: オミクロンの急増で、ロンドンが「重大インシデント」宣言
随着欧米茄的激增，伦敦宣布发生 "重大事件"。
隨着歐米茄的激增，倫敦宣佈發生 "重大事件"。
